creator: protected@nc.rr.com
text:
There is no way to negate a regexp. For example, the following will find lines 
containing "foo":

      <filterchain>
        <linecontainsregexp>
            <regexp pattern="foo*"/>
        </linecontainsregexp>
      </filterchain>

But there is no way to find lines that do *not* contain "foo".

This is fixed in CVS HEAD for Ant 1.7.

Thanks!
creator: mbenson@apache.org
